name: Dice Dance
description:
How did you use Houdini to make your game? 
Houdini uses CHOPs to analyze provided music tracks and SOPs + VEX to dynamically build level geometry and animations. Houdini Engine then brings all of that to Unity. 

List everything that was made before the jam. Pre-built, assets, textures, etc
Everything is new except camera character movement scripts.

Which game engine or platform did you use to make your game?
Unity

Besides Houdini, what other tools did you use to make your game?
Native Instruments Maschine and Bitwig Studio for music production.

List instructions and tips for playing your game here.
WASD to avoid incoming dice, sticking to the beat helps a lot.
